about_the_game: America's East Coast is home to some of the most beautiful canyons, beaches, mountains, gorges, mountains, and rivers. It is especially famous during the Fall, when the leaves turn to impossibly beautiful shades of red, orange and yellow. This experience will allow you to visit some of these beautiful locations, hear a guided narration, and get up and even walk about a bit! At a time when travel, especially international travel, is so hard, we want to make you feel truly transported. We want you to feel the vitality, the rawness of these beautiful places in the same way you'd feel if you were visiting these places for the first time. New places will be added frequently, even extending outside the United States. Come and be part of this exciting journey with us!
detailed_description: America's East Coast is home to some of the most beautiful canyons, beaches, mountains, gorges, mountains, and rivers. This experience will allow you to visit some of these beautiful locations, hear a guided narration, and get up and even walk about a bit! At a time when travel, especially international travel, is so hard, we want to make you feel truly transported. We want you to feel the vitality, the rawness of these beautiful places in the same way you'd feel if you were visiting these places for the first time. New places will be added frequently, even extending outside the United States. Come and be part of this exciting journey with us!

movies.name: Get Lost With Luke In Nature - Trailer

name: Get Lost In Nature With Luke

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-4590 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or greater
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Come and join Luke, and get lost in beautiful scenic locations, including gorges, rivers, mountains, canyons, beaches, and waterfalls in the United States and around the world.
